name: Kalios Demo
description:
Kalios is a 2D platform currently in development

In Kalios you play as a character that has newfound abilities that allow you to dash, teleport through spaces, and throw daggers at orbs to get you to new places

if you find any bugs or would like to see something in the game leave a message and we'll try our best to fix the issue or implement the feature

have fun good luck and thanks for downloading

WASD to move

Q/E to swap characters

right-click/ left shift to use abilities
